resources.string: 50 years of Computing\n at the University of\n Waikato
Click here for a fun fact about Computing at Waikato
Wide logo for the second activity

This year the University of Waikato is celebrating 50 years of computing excellence. The Department of Computer Science at the University of Waikato was founded in 1973. In 2023 we celebrate our students, alumni, research, software and more.
